BackstoryDef.title: amnesticized
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has completely forgotten recent life memories due to [PAWN_possessive] consumption of amnestics.

BackstoryDef.title: Horaxian D-Class
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a convicted, violent criminal who was obtained by the SCP Foundation for the purpose of studying Horax Anomalies. [PAWN_nameDef] came into contact with Horax Entities on the regular and, incredibly, [PAWN_pronoun] survied.

BackstoryDef.title: D-Class
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a violent criminal obtained by the SCP Foundation for the purpose of studying SCP's. [PAWN_pronoun] came into contact with Euclid or Keter-classed SCP's on the regular and has been frequently amnesticized. Before [PAWN_pronoun] escaped, [PAWN_nameDef] was slated for execution.

BackstoryDef.title: D-Class
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was convicted of a violent crime and sentenced to death. The SCP Foundation obtained [PAWN_pronoun] for the purpose of studying SCP's. Before [PAWN_nameDef] escaped, [PAWN_pronoun] was slated for execution.

BackstoryDef.title: anomalously altered
BackstoryDef.description: At some point in [PAWN_possessive] life, [PAWN_nameDef] was exposed to potentially dangerous effects emanating from some SCP, Horax, or other anomalous source. [PAWN_pronoun] was changed in some way that [PAWN_pronoun] refuses to explain.

BackstoryDef.title: containment specialist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of a containment team, either for the SCP Foundation or for some other cause. [PAWN_possessive] containment team is sent out to secure anomalous objects and contain them for further processing.

BackstoryDef.title: containment technician
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] helps refine and maintain the containment of captured SCP's and Horax anomalies, either for the SCP Foundation or for some other cause.

BackstoryDef.title: anomaly research assistant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a well-rounded assistant to any one of the myriads of scientists hiding on the Galactic Rim's planets, specializing in SCP's and Horax mutants. [PAWN_nameDef] is proficient in getting to various locations around [PAWN_possessive] research facility, so much so that others have difficulty keeping up with [PAWN_possessive].

BackstoryDef.title: anomaly chemist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a specialized researcher trained in chemistry. [PAWN_pronoun] is knowledgeable about chemicals and helps research SCP's and Horax anomalies on a chemical level.

BackstoryDef.title: anomaly botanist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a specialized researcher trained in botany. Focusing on Harbinger Trees and plant-based SCP's, [PAWN_pronoun] is knowledgeable about plants, bringing this expertise to better contain SCP and Horax anomalies.

BackstoryDef.title: anomaly researcher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a specialized researcher. [PAWN_pronoun] spends most of [PAWN_possessive] time researching unexplained anomalies, trying to figure out how they operate.

BackstoryDef.title: Foundation security officer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of a larger crew of officers who are tasked with maintaining physical or information security for Foundation projects, operations, and personnel. [PAWN_pronoun] is often the first line of defense against external threats.

BackstoryDef.title: Foundation tactical response officer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skilled member of a combat team. [PAWN_pronoun] helps escort containment teams when situations are dangerous. [PAWN_nameDef] is used to being ready at the drop of a hat, even during sleep.

BackstoryDef.title: Foundation field agent
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is trained to look for and investigate any signs of unidentified anomalous activity. [PAWN_pronoun] is trained to go undercover in local services.

BackstoryDef.title: Foundation site director
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is usually the most important person in a local Foundation site. All departmental directors report directly to [PAWN_possessive].

BackstoryDef.title: GOC undersecretary
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a principal assistant to a high member of the United Galactical Nations. [PAWN_pronoun] position allows insight into politics between nations.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC nexus assistant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] helps maintain a network of command hubs to coordinate and support local operations. [PAWN_pronoun] has an excellent memory and is quick on [PAWN_possessive] feet.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC command hub leader
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] works in one of the many connected command hubs. [PAWN_pronoun] reports to members of the GOC nexus.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC physics division assessment team investigator
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of one of the physics division's investigation teams. [PAWN_possessive] job is to investigate possible anomalous entities. Throughout [PAWN_possessive] career, [PAWN_pronoun] has gained a slight resistance to psychic phenomena.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC physics division assessment team observer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the physics division's observation team. [PAWN_possessive] task is to observe and determine if the anomaly can be captured or if it must be neutralized. [PAWN_pronoun] is sensitive to psychic phenomena as a result.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC physics division eliminator
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the physics division, and [PAWN_pronoun] is part of a strike squad trained to eliminate hostile anomalies. [PAWN_possessive] job has hardened [PAWN_possessive] to the reality of the job and the importance of the survival of intelligent life in the galaxy.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC physics division containment specialist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the physics division, and [PAWN_pronoun] is part of a strike squad trained to capture anomalies. [PAWN_possessive] experiences have led [PAWN_pronoun] to learn and adapt quickly.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC psyche division science observer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the psyche division. [PAWN_pronoun] is tasked with observing any investigation for any potential anomalous emergencies.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC psyche division ambassador
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the psyche division. [PAWN_pronoun] is tasked with maintaining diplomatic contacts with non-hostile anomalous or occult powers.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC ptolemy division quartermaster
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the ptolemy division. [PAWN_pronoun] helps maintain the distribution of supplies to various GOC facilities around the planetary system.

BackstoryDef.title: GOC ptolemy division researcher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the ptolemy division. [PAWN_pronoun] helps coordinate research into new technology as designated by the council of occult organizations.

BackstoryDef.title: CI gamma researcher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the Gamma Class. [PAWN_possessive] research skills allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to have a higher position in the Chaos Insurgency. It gives [PAWN_pronoun] access to oversight over Delta Command's orders.

BackstoryDef.title: CI gamma military commander
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the Gamma Class. [PAWN_possessive] position in the Chaos Insurgency's military gives [PAWN_pronoun] access to oversight on Delta Command's orders.

BackstoryDef.title: CI beta class fieldworker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] does various field work requested by Delta Command. [PAWN_pronoun] does not have the privilege of oversight of Delta Command's orders.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class grunt
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an ordinary Chaos Insurgency grunt. [PAWN_pronoun] was recruited by the Chaos Insurgency as someone highly expendable... not that [PAWN_nameDef] knows that.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class recruit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fresh recruit into the Chaos Insurgency. [PAWN_pronoun] is eager to follow the orders of Delta Command. [PAWN_nameDef] is unaware of [PAWN_possessive] expendability and of the dangers of anomalies.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class enslaved recruit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold into slavery to the Chaos Insurgency. [PAWN_pronoun] is unaware of [PAWN_possessive] expendability and of the dangers of anomalies.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class architect
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an architect recruited by the Chaos Insurgency. [PAWN_pronoun] was lured by the prospect of steady employment, just like many others.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class chef
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a line cook before joining the Chaos Insurgency. [PAWN_pronoun] was lured by the prospect of steady employment, just like many others.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class biologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skilled biologist when [PAWN_pronoun] took an offer of recruitment from the Chaos Insurgency. [PAWN_pronoun] was lured by the prospect of steady employment, just like many others.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class gun specialist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at servicing weapons, shooting weapons, and not much else. After all, [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Chaos Insurgency without many questions.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class sapper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was happy to take the offer from the Chaos Insurgency, unaware that [PAWN_pronoun] would be raiding facilities. [PAWN_pronoun] was lured by the prospect of steady employment, just like many others.

BackstoryDef.title: CI alpha class medic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skilled medical professional. [PAWN_pronoun] encountered anomalous activity one evening and joined the Chaos Insurgency instead of returning to blissful ignorance.

BackstoryDef.title: Global Occult Coalition defector
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] disliked how the Global Occult Coalition was handling anomalies and defected to the Chaos Insurgency.

BackstoryDef.title: Foundation defector
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] disliked how the SCP Foundation was handling anomalies and defected to the Chaos Insurgency.

BackstoryDef.title: CI violence enthusiast
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was happy to join the Chaos Insurgency, as long as [PAWN_possessive] bloodlust was satiated.
